comment.author: 97533501@N00
comment._content: Hmm ... could it be en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ignaz_Trebitsch-Lincoln ? "Ignatius Timothy Trebitsch-Lincoln (4 April 1879 - 4 October 1943) a Hungarian, was a Jewish adventurer who spent parts of his life as a Protestant missionary, Anglican priest, British Member of Parliament for Darlington, convicted fraudster, German right-wing politician and spy, and Buddhist abbot in China. What a career!
